scripts.dev:backend: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Set-Location -Path 'E:\PROJECTS ML\ai-document-search'; & '.\.venv\Scripts\python.exe' -m uvicorn app.main:app --app-dir '.\backend' --reload --reload-dir '.\backend' --lifespan off --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000"
scripts.dev:frontend: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Set-Location -Path 'E:\PROJECTS ML\ai-document-search\frontend'; npm install --no-audit --no-fund; npm run dev"
scripts.dev: concurrently --raw --names backend,frontend --prefix-colors blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
